param.name: file_type_dir
param.label: Select type of File
param.help: Eigenstratgeno=eigensoft, lped=linkage pedigree, pbed=plink compressed, pphe=plink/fbat/pbat phenotype

tool.help:
**Notes on parameters**
- **Type of file** Eigenstratgeno=eigensoft, lped=linkage pedigree, pbed=plink compressed, pphe=plink/fbat/pbat phenotype - **File to import** Choose a file from the files made available by your system administrator of the type specified
After you select the **type of file**, you will be able to select a specific one from all the available files of that type on the next page
**Summary**
This tool allows you to import new data sets into your current history from a library of files made available by your system administrator - the files must be placed in a specific place on the filesystem to appear here
The different file types are each kept in a separate folder, so you must first choose the kind of file you want to import, then on the next screen, you will be able to choose from a list of available files
